Claim: "A group of people sit in chairs in a circle."
Implication: "A group of people are sitting on chairs in a circle."
Referring expressions: A group of people, chairs, circle.  A group of people, chairs, circle.
Formula: (exists c (exists a (IsSitInChairs(a) and IsInCircle(c))) & (forall d ( IsSitInChairs(d) ->  IsSittingOnChairs(d))) & (forall e ( IsSittingOnChairs(e) ->  IsSitInChairs(e)))) -> (exists c (exists a (IsSittingOnChairs(a) and IsInCircle(c))))
